sources.title: Picnic Panic (1946)
sources.description: A young Mexican boy, his girl, and his mule go on a picnic, and are having a good time when they come upon a temperamental volcano and, then, almost anything can happen and almost does. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/picnic-panic-1946/

metadata.Plot: A young Indian boy, his girl, and his mule go on a picnic, and are having a good time when they come upon a temperamental volcano and, then, almost anything can happen and almost does.
